articles.author: Sagarika Jaisinghani, Michael Msika
articles.title: Hedge Funds Bet on Europe in Hunt for Next Leg of Stock Rally - Bloomberg
articles.description: Investors are betting that Europe will drive the next leg of the global equity rally, broadening their playbooks as a more expensive US market evokes memories of the dot-com bubble.
articles.content:
Investors are betting that Europe will drive the next leg of the global equity rally, broadening their playbooks as a more expensive US market evokes memories of the dot-com bubble.
